project.name: Postworld
project.description: WordPress framework for displaying posts in creative ways.

Directives.name: Directives
Directives.description: Loads a post template and injects it with data.

pwPostShareReport.name: pwPostShareReport
pwPostShareReport.description:
Post Share Report
Populates the scope with a post share report
for the current contextual post.

loadPost.name: loadPost
loadPost.description: Loads a post template and injects it with data.

params.name: postView
params.description: Which registered view template to use.

params.name: postQuery
params.description: Query vars to derive post from.

params.name: postClass
params.description: Optional. Classes to add to the template element.

params.name: postLoading
params.description: Optional. An expression to assign a loading boolean.

classitems.description:
Bootstrap.js by @fat & @mdo
plugins: bootstrap-transition.js, bootstrap-modal.js, bootstrap-dropdown.js, bootstrap-scrollspy.js, bootstrap-tab.js, bootstrap-tooltip.js, bootstrap-popover.js, bootstrap-affix.js, bootstrap-alert.js, bootstrap-button.js, bootstrap-collapse.js, bootstrap-carousel.js, bootstrap-typeahead.js

Specify the number of expected assertions to gurantee that failed test (no assertions are run at all) don't slip through.

example: ok( "asdfasdf".length > 5, "There must be at least 5 chars" );

classitems.description:
Checks that the first two arguments are equal, with an optional message.
Prints out both actual and expected values.

Prefered to ok( actual == expected, message )

Resets the test setup. Useful for tests that modify the DOM.

If jQuery is available, uses jQuery's html(), otherwise just innerHTML.
Trigger an event on an element.

(http://www.opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php) Date: 5/15/2008
classitems.projectdescription: Advanced and extensible data dumping for Javascript.
classitems.author: Ariel Flesler

classitems.description:
User Share Report : Outgoing / Incoming
Populates the scope with an outgoing user share report
showing posts which the given user has shared.
classitems.name: pwPostShareReport
